banner.ticketsSignUp: Sign up to get your spot

info.welcome: Welcome to vOpen! One of the most important community organized set of technology events in Latin America.
info.mission: Our mission is to connect connect students, professionals, technical experts and organizations from around the globe to share knowledge, experiences and promote technological innovation.
info.history: Our history started as .NET Conf, a conference that started five years ago and was held in 4 coutries.
info.today: Find out what happened in previous editions
info.sponsorship: We offer different sponsorship packages, and you can also prepare your own based on the different opportunities offered. If you have unique needs or new ideas, let us know and we will work together to meet your marketing and business needs.

titles.sloganTeam: Committed to making a great event
titles.sponsorship: A non-profit event focused on technology and innovation
